title: Tetra
full_text:
Tetra
"The Tetra is a Lycentian interceptor."
The Tetra is a T1 interceptor-class ship of the Lycentian Righteous line. It is best suited as a tanky interceptor, with agility and durability in a powerful combination.
Advantages
The Tetra has a balanced rig layout allowing for many different builds. At base stats, it is an improved version of the Paragon's hitpoints with slightly less speed and agility. It excels at roles involving combat with slower, easier-to-track ships.
Disadvantages
The Tetra is an T1 faction interceptor, and thus will perform poorly against its upgraded counterparts. In addition, it's shield-based health pool causes it to be vulnerable to ion-class weapons. It is less agile compared to similar interceptor-class ships, and can be outmaneuvered.
As a faction ship, its blueprint must be purchased using Loyalty Points at a faction terminal or from other players, making it less accessible to new or neutral players.
Trivia
- The current Tetra is modeled by ii_Cove.
